thread.title_full: Wonderful Staff - Review of Novotel London West, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: SimonJan
title: Wonderful Staff
text: For a 'chain' hotel, the customer service is truly outstanding. The reception staff are very well trained and friendly (Aurelia was lovely, and noticed we were returning guests). We had an 8th floor Superior room and it was great - very quiet. It's a 6 minute walk to Hammersmith Tube and lots of restaurants nearby. The bar was great for snacks and pre-dinner drinks. The breakfast was also great even though it was busy, the staff coped well. I wish all hotels trained their staff so well.
